NEW blog: @SecretaryRoss Outlines Commerce-Led Initiatives to Advance Space Leadership https://t.co/yX4R0ZQwh4 #Space https://t.co/vEc8idJgb9

.@SecretaryRoss: ‚ÄúWe need a future-oriented space commerce agenda and supportive regulatory regime. With input and guidance from the Space Council, the Department of Commerce can be the one-stop shop the industry so sorely needs.‚Äù
.@SecretaryRoss: ‚ÄúFor too long the commercial space industry has been forced to waste valuable time and resources interfacing with a multitude of government agencies and regulatory bodies.‚Äù

.@SecretaryRoss: ‚ÄúCommerce‚Äôs review of the outdated regulatory framework, discussions with an ambitious but frustrated space industry, and meetings within the Administration have made one thing clear: The rate of regulatory change must match the rate of technological change!‚Äù

.@SecretaryRoss: ‚ÄúSince the Council‚Äôs first meeting last October, the Department of Commerce has identified regulatory barriers to commercial space activity and developed a vision for the future of space commerce.‚Äù
.@SecretaryRoss outlined his plans for cutting red tape to advance American leadership in space during today's meeting of the National Space Council at @NASAKennedy. https://t.co/8AyJN9IaLx #space
.@SecretaryRoss: ‚ÄúA Bright Future for U.S. Leadership of Space Commerce‚Äù https://t.co/8AyJN9ZMa7 #space

The Tax Cuts Act will get rid of our outdated worldwide taxation system, which penalizes companies headquartered in the United States when they bring foreign profits back home. #TaxReform
Businesses will be able to deduct 100 percent of the cost of their capital investments for the next five years. #TaxReform
America‚Äôs corporate tax rate will be lowered from the highest in the developed world to below the Organisation of Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) average. #TaxReform
The Tax Cuts Act enacts pro-growth reform, putting American businesses on a level playing field with foreign competitors. #TaxReform
The Tax Cuts Act will repeal #ObamaCare's burdensome individual mandate. #TaxReform
The Tax Cuts Act nearly doubles the standard deduction. #TaxReform
The Tax Cuts Act provides $5.5 trillion in tax cuts, $3.2 trillion, or nearly 60 percent, of which go to families. #TaxReform
‚¨Ü Take home pay -- the Tax Cuts Act means less money taken out of Americans' paychecks. #TaxReform

And, in fiscal year 2018, an additional $9.8 billion in lifetime net regulatory cost savings is expected to be enacted -- totaling $686.6 million per year. #CutTheRedTape #RegulatoryReform
These regulatory reform actions have resulted in a total of $8.1 billion in lifetime net regulatory cost savings -- totaling $570 million per year. #CutTheRedTape #RegulatoryReform
In total, agencies have withdrawn or delayed 1,579 planned regulatory actions -- 635 were withdrawn, 244 were made inactive, and 700 were delayed. #CutTheRedTape #RegulatoryReform
To date, the Trump Administration issued 22 deregulatory actions for every one new regulatory action. #CutTheRedTape #RegulatoryReform
The Trump Administration has far exceeded its promise to eliminate regulations at a 2:1 ratio and impose no lifetime net regulatory costs. #CutTheRedTape #RegulatoryReform
